name: Echoes of Aeons
blurb: Is an ARPG being made by Alchimia Studios and YOU. We are looking to raise the bar for modern 2D RPG's.

rewards.reward: No Reward
A thank you email from our team. We truly appreciate your support!
Receive a pre-purchase GAME COPY for iOS, Android, Mac, or PC. You will also receive a thank you email from the creators of the game.

MUSIC LOVER'S PRE-OST!  .....................\r\nDon't want to wait for all 60+ tracks of The Original Soundtrack (OST) to come out in 6 - 8 months? No Problem! Get This special release "Echoes of Aeons - OST - Kickstarter Special Preview Edition" CD, with 15 original tracks. (Only available in digital download). Album preview update event will be coming soon. Stay tuned to the kickstarter update posts. Digital CD will be available for digital download on Sept 1, 2012 - just a few weeks after our Kickstarter project finalizes. Also includes previous pledge level of pre-purchase game copy.(Game copy not avail. till Feb. 2013)

Includes all previous pledge levels ...........\r\nPLUS: This is the first level of physical rewards! You will receive a EoA button with our logo. Plus previous rewards. See our rewards section for more information and a mockup.

Includes all previous pledge levels ...........\r\nPLUS: In game weapon set \u201cDragonsbane\u201d. This set includes unique weapons for both of the main characters (a set of in-game daggers and a sword).

SPECIAL!!!! EARLY PLEDGER EDITION - this is the same as the $50 level. Includes digital deluxe edition of the soundtrack and the digital art book (pdf). And to make this reward level even better, your name as a pledger goes in the credits! (Also Includes all previous pledge level rewards)

Includes all previous pledge levels ...........\r\nPLUS: In game item "Dragon's Tear". This is an equipable item that will give you awesome stat/buff bonuses. If you have this equipped and the Dragonsbane weapons you will receive an awesome set bonus! (scales with level)

Includes all previous pledge level rewards ....\r\nPLUS: In game pet "Red Dragon Whelpling". He'll follow you anywhere and gives you a 3 piece set bonus when equipped with previous rewards (scales with level).
THE MUSIC LOVERS DELUXE EDITION..........\r\nIncludes a digital copy of the soundtrack with over 60 in game songs. Also Includes all previous pledge level rewards as well.

THE DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION .............\r\nThis is the one you've been waiting for - Includes digital deluxe edition of the soundtrack and the digital art book (pdf). And to make this reward level even better, your name as a pledger goes in the credits! (Also Includes all previous pledge level rewards)

Includes all previous pledge levels ...........\r\nPLUS: This is the second level of physical rewards! Receive a set of high quality art decals, includes The logo and a bunch of our concept/game art! Plus previous rewards. See our rewards section for more information and a mockup.

Includes all previous pledge levels rewards .....\r\nPLUS: The third level of our physical rewards is meant for the T-shirt or mousepad collectors out there (you know who you are). You get your choice of T-shirt from 2 designs (you can choose to have it signed or not) OR an EoA Mousepad (only choose one). We will contact you for sizing and color/design. (Does not stack with $150 level, no matter how high you go (except 10k), see chart)

Includes all previous pledge levels rewards (minus the $100 level) .....\r\nPLUS: The fourth level of our physical rewards is meant for the T-shirt AND mousepad collectors out there (you know who you are). You get your choice of T-shirt from 2 designs (you can choose to have it signed or not) AND an EoA Mousepad. We will contact you for size and color/design.

THE STEIN............................................ Includes all previous pledge levels rewards..... \r\nPLUS: Who doesn't enjoy sitting back and playing a good game with a stein of ice cold ale? Choose from Two designs from in-game taverns, you also get the stein in the game as well!

THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION....................\r\nThis reward includes a copy of the Hard cover art book and a hard copy of the deluxe soundtrack. Signed by the entire team. Plus it Includes all previous pledge levels. (See our rewards section for more information.)
Includes all previous pledge levels ...........\r\nPLUS: Beautifully framed and signed LIMITED EDITION PRINTS. See our rewards section for more information.

THE BIG 500!..........................................
Includes all previous pledge level rewards ....
THAT MEANS everything so far listed, including Music Lovers Edition, Digital Deluxe Edition, In game equipment and gear, physical rewards, The Collecters Edition.........................
PLUS: Custom Engraved 8GB USB Flash Drive:
This Flash drive will be loaded with the Digital Artbook, the Uncompressed CD Quality Original Sound Track, and a unique Piece of Art, and other digital items.

HEY YOU,  NPC!  ........................................... This one is cool - you get to have a minor NPC named after you - or named to something of your choice ( cannot be inappropriate). Plus all previous pledge level rewards.

HELLO MAJOR...............................................\r\nHave a major NPC named after you or named to something of your choice ( cannot be inappropriate). Plus all previous pledge level rewards (does not include minor npc naming).
HAND DRAWN SKETCH.............................\r\nGet an original hand drawn and signed sketch from one of our Lead Artists. Plus all previous levels except: (Does not include major/minor NPC)

PROP OR ITEM!.............................................\r\nDie hard gamers and awesome pledgers -  We will work with you to help you create a prop/decoration, or other item of your choice that will appear in the game! You will be thanked in the credits, and be listed as a contributing game designer. Includes all previous rewards. (You also get to help name the chosen in-game asset item you helped create only, does not stack with minor or major npc naming reward or hand drawn sketch).

WEAPONS MASTER!...................................\r\nAhem. Excuse me? Are you a weapons Master? Well with this awesome level, you get to help  name and create a weapon of your choice that will appear in the game! You will be thanked in the credits, and be listed as a contributing game designer. Includes all previous rewards....of course. (You also get to help name the chosen in-game asset item you helped create only, does not stack with major or minor npc naming levels)

PRODUCER ON THE SET!......................... Includes all the crazy previous pledge levels ... PLUS: You as a contributing Producer: Help create a creature, item, or NPC in every aspect. Help design the story/lore and quest around them and work with us to create the graphics. (Contact us before donating to this level.)...... eoa@alchimiastudios.com (Does not include creating a weapon)

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER...............................\r\nThe very best of the best - Includes all previous pledge level rewards - including being able to work directly with us to create the look, feel, inhabitants, and lore of an entire zone! (multiple areas per zone). And an exclusive signed sketch from our artists of whatever you want us to draw. And you also can attend our launch party as a VIP! (must be able to pay for travel expenses). Contact us before donating to this level. This one also includes all of the naming levels. See rewards chart.
